summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the criminal code, amending Sections 12A.02.080, 12A.02.150, 12A.08.010, Subsection A4 of Section 12A.10.010, Subsection A of Section 12A.18.010, 12A.18.090, and Subsection A of Section 12A.24.150, repealing Subsections C and D of Section 12A.24.025, and adding a section to Chapter 12A.02 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
